camps.title: Himalayan Base Camp Adventure
camps.description: Experience the majestic beauty of the Himalayas with our expertly guided base camp trek. This adventure takes you through pristine alpine meadows, ancient rhododendron forests, and offers breathtaking views of snow-capped peaks. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts seeking an authentic mountain experience.
camps.shortDescription: 5-day Himalayan trek with stunning mountain views and expert guides

organizer.name: Mountain Spirits Adventures
organizer.bio: Leading Himalayan expeditions for over 15 years with a focus on safety and authentic experiences

amenities.name: Professional Guide
amenities.description: Certified mountain guide with first aid training

amenities.name: Nutritious Meals
amenities.description: Fresh, hot meals prepared by experienced camp cooks

amenities.name: Safety Equipment
amenities.description: First aid kit, emergency communication devices

activities.name: Summit Trek
activities.description: Challenging trek to Kedarkantha peak with panoramic views

activities.name: Star Gazing
activities.description: Clear mountain skies perfect for astronomy

activities.name: Photography Workshop
activities.description: Learn landscape photography techniques

itinerary.title: Arrival and Base Camp Setup
itinerary.description: Arrive at Sankri village, meet the team, and set up base camp

itinerary.title: Trek to Juda Ka Talab
itinerary.description: Trek through dense pine forests to the beautiful Juda Ka Talab

itinerary.title: Kedarkantha Base Camp
itinerary.description: Ascend to Kedarkantha base camp through alpine meadows

itinerary.title: Summit Day
itinerary.description: Early morning summit attempt and descent to Hargaon

itinerary.title: Return to Sankri
itinerary.description: Final descent to Sankri and departure

pricing.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 15 days before trek. 50% refund for 7-15 days. No refund for less than 7 days.

camps.title: Kerala Backwaters Eco Camp
camps.description: Experience the serene beauty of Kerala's backwaters with our eco-friendly floating camps. Enjoy traditional houseboat stays, Ayurvedic treatments, local cuisine, and peaceful canoe rides through palm-fringed waterways.
camps.shortDescription: 4-day eco-friendly backwater experience with houseboat stays

organizer.name: Backwater Bliss
organizer.bio: Sustainable tourism specialists offering authentic Kerala backwater experiences

images.caption: Peaceful canoe journey through palm-lined waterways
Local village life along the backwaters

amenities.name: Traditional Houseboat
amenities.description: Authentic Kerala houseboat with modern amenities

activities.name: Canoe Ride
activities.description: Peaceful canoe rides through narrow canals

itinerary.title: Arrival and Houseboat Check-in
itinerary.description: Arrive in Alleppey and board your traditional houseboat

pricing.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before.

camps.title: Goa Beach Camping Adventure
camps.description: Experience the vibrant beach culture of Goa with beachside camping, water sports, and sunset parties.
camps.shortDescription: 3-day beach camping with water sports and beach activities

organizer.name: Coastal Adventures Goa
organizer.bio: Beach camping specialists with focus on water sports and coastal experiences

itinerary.description: Arrive at Arambol beach and set up camp

pricing.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before.

camps.title: Ladakh High Altitude Desert Adventure
camps.description: Experience the mystical beauty of Ladakh's high altitude desert with its dramatic landscapes, ancient monasteries, and crystal-clear night skies. This adventure combines cultural exploration with breathtaking natural beauty.
camps.shortDescription: 6-day high altitude desert experience with monastery visits

organizer.name: Himalayan High Adventures
organizer.bio: Specialists in high altitude adventures and cultural experiences

images.caption: Dramatic Ladakh desert with snow-capped peaks
Ancient Buddhist monastery in Nubra Valley

activities.name: Monastery Visits
activities.description: Visit ancient Buddhist monasteries

activities.name: Camel Safari
activities.description: Double-humped Bactrian camel rides

pricing.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 10 days before.

camps.title: Coorg Coffee Plantation Retreat
camps.description: Immerse yourself in the lush green coffee plantations of Coorg with guided plantation walks, coffee tasting sessions, and peaceful nature camping surrounded by aromatic coffee plants.
camps.shortDescription: 3-day coffee plantation camping with tasting sessions

organizer.name: Coorg Nature Escapes
organizer.bio: Eco-tourism specialists in Coorg's coffee country

camps.title: Rishikesh River Rafting & Camping
camps.description: Experience the thrill of white water rafting on the Ganges followed by peaceful riverside camping. Perfect combination of adventure and spirituality in the yoga capital of the world.
camps.shortDescription: 4-day river rafting and spiritual camping experience

organizer.name: Ganges Adventure Sports
organizer.bio: Premier adventure sports company in Rishikesh

images.caption: Ancient temples and ashrams in Rishikesh

activities.name: White Water Rafting

activities.name: Bungee Jumping

itinerary.description: Arrive in Rishikesh and get introduced to river activities

pricing.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before.

camps.title: Munnar Tea Garden Camping
camps.description: Wake up to misty mornings in the rolling tea gardens of Munnar. Experience tea plucking, processing tours, and serene camping amidst the Western Ghats' pristine beauty.

camps.title: Andaman Beach Island Camping
camps.description: Experience pristine white sand beaches, crystal clear waters, and tropical island camping. Includes snorkeling, scuba diving, and beachside bonfires under starlit skies.
camps.shortDescription: 5-day tropical island camping with water sports

organizer.name: Andaman Island Adventures

camps.title: Spiti Valley Cold Desert Expedition
camps.description: Journey through the mystical cold desert of Spiti Valley with its ancient monasteries, dramatic landscapes, and unique high-altitude desert ecosystem. A photographer's paradise.
camps.shortDescription: 7-day cold desert expedition with monastery visits

organizer.name: Trans-Himalayan Expeditions

camps.title: Rajasthan Desert Safari Experience
camps.description: Immerse yourself in the golden sands of the Thar Desert with our authentic desert camping experience. Enjoy camel safaris, traditional Rajasthani cuisine, folk performances, and starlit nights in luxury desert camps.
camps.shortDescription: 3-day luxury desert camping with camel safari and cultural experiences

organizer.name: Desert Dreams Expeditions
organizer.bio: Specialists in authentic Rajasthani desert experiences with a focus on cultural immersion

images.caption: Luxury desert camp during golden hour
Majestic sand dunes of Thar Desert
Stargazing in the clear desert sky
